# HKWheelchairUseObject

**Class**

This class acts as a wrapper for the wheelchair use enumeration.

## Declaration

```swift
class HKWheelchairUseObject
```

## Accessing Wheelchair Use Data

- **wheelchairUse**: A value indicating the user’s wheelchair use.

## Classes

- **HKAudiogramSensitivityPointClampingRange**: Defines the range within which an ear’s sensitivity point may have been clamped, if any.
- **HKAudiogramSensitivityTest**
- **HKBiologicalSexObject**: This class acts as a wrapper for the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKBiologicalSex] enumeration.
- **HKBloodTypeObject**: This class acts as a wrapper for the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKBloodType] enumeration.
- **HKFitzpatrickSkinTypeObject**: This class acts as a wrapper for the [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKFitzpatrickSkinType] enumeration.
- **HKGAD7Assessment**
- **HKPHQ9Assessment**
- **HKScoredAssessment**
- **HKScoredAssessmentType**
- **HKStateOfMind**
- **HKStateOfMindType**

## Inherits From

- NSObject

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable

- NSObjectProtocol
